alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southeast Johnson County; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 25 at 3:55AM MDT until March 26 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the eastern Bighorn Basin, 6 to 14 inches in the Cody Foothills, and 6 to 10 inches in northern Johnson County. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Bighorn Basin, Cody Foothills, and Johnson County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Sunday. Heaviest snow will fall today into tonight. * IMPACTS...
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southeast Johnson County; Southwest Big Horn Basin
